#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 day seven : Portugal ,
#Text=Uruguay , Spain win 1-0
#Text=Thursday , June 21 , 2018

#Text=Yesterday , day seven of the 2018 FIFA footall World Cup , Portugal defeated Morocco 1 – 0 , Uruguay defeated Saudi Arabia 1 – 0 and Iran lost 1 – 0 against Spain with goals from Cristiano Ronaldo , Luis Suárez and Diego Costa respectively .
#Text=With this victory , Uruguay and hosts Russia have qualified for the Last 16 knockout phase .
#Text=Group B — Portugal 1 – 0 Morocco
#Text=Portugal faced Morocco in the first game of the day at Moscow ' s Luzhniki Stadium .
#Text=Morocco had better ball possession in the match .
#Text=Morocco conceded a corner kick early in the first half in the 4th minute .
#Text=Portugal 's captain Cristiano Ronaldo scored a header from João Moutinho ' s assist , giving Portugal an early lead .
#Text=In the 9th minute , Ronaldo almost doubled the lead for Portugal , but his shot went wide to the left of the goal .
#Text=Two minutes later , Morroco 's captain Medhi Benatia got a chance to equalise , but his header was blocked .
#Text=Morocco had multiple attempts to equalise but all missed or were blocked .
#Text=Benatia was booked in the 40th minute for a bad foul .
#Text=The first half ended with Portugal leading 1 – 0 .
#Text=In the second half , Ronaldo had another chance to double Portugal 's lead but his shot missed the target .
#Text=Though Morocco had several attempts for goal , Portugal 's goalkeeper Rui Patricio managed not to let any goals in .
#Text=The match finished 1 – 0 as Morocco fell to the bottom of the table , having lost both matches in this tournament and having zero points .
#Text=After the match , Morocco 's manager Herve Renard said , " We qualified for a World Cup after 20 years and we 've showed that we can play football .
